meaningMnemonic: <radical>Gambler</radical>s usually only see the <radical>sun</radical> at <kanji>dawn</kanji>. They gamble all day and through the night, and if they leave it's at the crack of dawn to get home, clean up, and then go back. I haven't known a gambler who's seen the sun ... well ever!
readingMnemonic: If you're up at <kanji>dawn</kanji> you'll also see the <reading>あか</reading>(red) <reading>つき</reading>(moon). The あかつき only happens as the sun comes up at dawn so usually only gamblers see it. But if you get up early, you can see it too!
